ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Playstation
ygData.msgSnippet: I didn t say it was great to beta. Nor did I comment on the justifications of why certain groups were allowed to beta test. I simply stated that the everquest2
ygData.messageBody:
I didn't say it was great to beta. Nor did I comment on the justifications
of why certain groups were allowed to beta test. I simply stated that the
everquest2 site said Legends subscribers have first shots at beta testing
AND asked the poster to not insult other posters.
luv,
-Su

> People who play a lot get a shot at betatesting, its in no way exclusive
to
> the legends subscribers. Its a quite well known fact that people on
legends
> are more "addicted" to eq and play a lot more than the average eq player.
> its *not* related to the amount of cash they pour in, its more tied to
> playing hours.
>
> And really, its not that fancy to play in beta , its nothing to envy.
>
> /R
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 14, 2002 1:24 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Playstation
>
>
> Excuse me, but I am the moderator and I will judge what can be said. I
> decide who lives or dies! MWAHAHAHAHAHAHA.
> Anyways, it is NOT an unfounded rumor. It is true according to Sony on
their
> official everquest2 website. So please don't start insulting other
posters.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > Yeah, it would be a real bitch if those who actually pay more than some
> > get's to see it first =/ Ohh, not to mention that they will pay
$40/month
> to
> > betatest EQ2 lol. But anyhow, spreading rumors ain't my thing. So just
> > wanted to add that and say, don't spread the shit untill you know the
> facts.
> > =P
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: nara MKs [mailto:masterkiis_nara@...]
> > Sent: den 7 maj 2002 16:31
> > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > Subject: RE: Re: [EverQuest] Playstation
> >
> >
> > Or how about the "rumor" i heard that the first people
> > to have access to the alledged EQ2 will be ONLY those
> > who are on Legends? We peons will have to wait who
> > knows how long...am getting burned out on all the
> > politics and greed...AO is looking REALLY good about
> > now
> >
> > Amaiya, 21st season Druid
> > Fennin Ro
> >
> > --- Romanlegion88@... wrote:
> > > Well now we know where all the new development ideas
> > > have gone.... This kinda thing pisses me off. Like
> > > the legends server should be what everyone already
> > > pays for, and all the ideas and new development for
> > > this PS2 game is the kind of thing they should be
> > > doing to the current EQ and its paying subscribers.
> > > When is the last time you been to a GM event, or
> > > have seen a majot development to the story with new
> > > zones or changes in zones?
> > >
> > > -rob
